text.p: Anniversary - (built 1979) 107,140 dwt del Cape Passero spot trip via St.Lawrence redel Cont $10,000 daily Dreyfus option via USG $9,500 daily.
Ispat Gaurav - (built 1994) 71,535 dwt 14 on 32 plus 1.5 del Santos 29/11-5/12 trip two laden legs redel Gibraltar-Hamburg range $11,750 daily plus $175,000 bb Cargill.
Romandie - (built 1995) 75,460 dwt 14 on 33.5 del Cigading ppt trip via Australia redel Japan $13,000 daily NYK.
Achilles - (built 1989) 75,460 dwt 14 on 28 plus 2.5 del Taiwan ppt trip via Australia redel Japan approx. $12,800 daily NYK.
Evgenia - (built 1981) 69,428 dwt 13 on 33 plus 1.8 del Ulsan 17-24/11 trip via Roberts Bank redel Lisbon $8,250 daily Cetragpa.
China Pride - (built 1990) 65,656 dwt 14 on 32 del Japan ppt four to six months trading $10,500 daily Halla.
Bunga Srigading - (built 1982) 65,921 dwt 12.5 on 30 plus 1.5 del Taiwan ppt trip via Goa redel Japan approx. $11,000 daily Navix.
Captain George L - (built 1984) 63,986 dwt 13 on 31.5 plus 1.5 del passing Muscat outbound 20-30/11 three to five months trading $10,250 daily Torm Asia.
Astor - (built 1977) 64,833 dwt 13 on 33 plus 2.5 del Mideast Gulf 22/12 trip Hong Kong $10,800 daily Green Island Cement.
Topaz - (built 1985) 46,134 dwt 14 on 27.5 del Japan 20-25/11 trip Nopac r/v $8,400 daily Pan Ocean.
Uljanik - (built 1996) 43,800 dwt del N.Japan ppt four to six months trading $8,100 daily Rondeau.
TBN - 41,000 dwt del Black Sea Nov trip Singapore-Japan range $11,000 daily Linkvest.
Prabhu Das - (built 1985) 31,253 dwt del Singapore end Nov trip via Kalimantan redel Japan $6,750 daily Showa.
TBN - (built 1977) 26,500 dwt del SE Asia Nov trip Mideast Gulf $5,150 daily Pan Ocean.
Lady Emily - (built 1988) 17,506 dwt del Townsville Nov/Dec trip China $4,500 daily plus $50,000 bb Gearbulk.
